text:
@realDonaldTrump Donald Trump wanted to start a White House talk radio show to take questions from Americans about the coronavirus. He then decided not to move forward with it — in part because he didn’t want to compete with Rush Limbaugh.

https://t.co/8se0M8QXso

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
